node.html: Peer-reviewing submitted paper in well-known journals such as IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics, Sensors, IEEE Access and etc. The verified review list can be seen at Publons
Lead a computer training for Indonesian migrants workers (BMI) in Korea. Through collaboration between Embassy of Indonesia in Korea and Indonesian Students Association in Korea (PERPIKA).

frontmatter.company: Embassy of The Republic of Indonesia in Seoul, Republic of Korea

node.html: Helped the PERPIKA organization to establish the election for the president position and the leaders of each regional.

Participated at the World Class Scholar Symposium (SCKD) event hosted by The Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education of The Republic of Indonesia in August 2019 to make contributions on accelerating Indonesian national development.
